project.name: SPIFFE + SPIRE
project.description: The Secure Production Identity Framework For Everyone (SPIFFE) Project defines a framework and set of standards for identifying and securing communications between application services. SPIRE (the SPIFFE Runtime Environment) is a toolchain of APIs for establishing trust between software systems across a wide variety of hosting platforms. It is a reference implementation of the SPIFFE specifications. The SPIFFE organization hosts multiple projects, with SPIFFE and SPIRE being the core projects.
